message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IR 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with word alignment models in machine translation. It could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it proposes a framework for parameter estimation using smoothing techniques. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it deals with natural language processing and machine translation. It may also fall under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) as it discusses the issue of overfitting in sparse data. Finally, it could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as it proposes a new performance criterion for evaluating word alignment models.
